page.title: 20Churches
page.content: ST ANDREWS - belongs to the Church of Scotland and it is situated at the start of Carlingwark Park. The present minister is Rev.Swan. The Congregation is approx 130. There is a Sunday School for children. ST JOHNS - belongs to the Roman Catholic Church, and is situated at the start of Abercromby Road. The present minister is Father Harkin. The congregation is approx. 160. There is a small Sunday School. ST RINGANS - belongs to the Church of Scotland and is situated in Queen Street. The present minister is Rev. Hamill. The Congregation is approx. 150. There is a Sunday School. ST NINIANS - Scottish Episcopal Church It is situated at the back of Carlingwark Park. The present minister is Rev.Bell. Family service held and the Congregation is 41.
